name: .22 magazine
description: A standard 10 round capacity magazine for a .22 pistol.

name: .357 magazine
description: The standard magazine for a .357 semi-automatic, holds 7 rounds.
//: A Coonan.357 weighs (approx.) 1383.5 empty and 1496.9 full.  If a single round weighs 8 (can't be less than a .38) and there are 7 in a mag then (8*7)+X==113.4 and so the mag itself must weigh 57.4

name: Strike One 9mm magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Browning HP, holds 17 rounds staggered.

name: S&W 9mm magazine
description: The S&W 9mm magazine, holds 14 rounds double column.

name: Browning HP 9mm magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Browning HP, holds 13 rounds staggered.

name: compact concealed carry 9mm magazine
description: The standard magazine for a compact handgun, holds 7 rounds.

name: Stechkin magazine
description: The standard magazine for the APB Stechkin, holds 20 rounds double-stacked with a double feed.

name: VD-01 cylindrical magazine
description: An under-barrel, 33-round, helical loading, cylindrical magazine made for the Voros-Danuvia VD-01.
